title: Will covid 19 be the end of all small businesses in America? - Quora
tags: Business in the United States of America
Politics of the United States of America

response.answer_text: Q: Will the Proposition 19 be the end of all small businesses in America? Doing a quick search brought up the following. California Proposition 19 (also known as the Regulate, Control & Tax Cannabis Act) If this is the proposition referred to, this proposition is for California it has no effect on any other state or federal government. Also the federal government does not have ballot initiatives, congress passes bills which or either signed into law or vetoed. So no, just because the voters in California defeated a ballot initiative to legalize marijuana, does not mean that small businesses are doomed.
NOPE. 1 - This is a California issue and NOT a nationwide issue. 2 - It involves Canibus ONLY.
